Title: Heaven Is for Real
Overview: The true story of the 4-year old son of a small-town pastor who, during emergency surgery, slips from consciousness and enters heaven. When he awakes, he recounts his experiences on the other side.
production_companies: TriStar Pictures, Screen Gems, Roth Films
Cast: Greg Kinnear, Kelly Reilly, Connor Corum
clean_text: heaven real true story 4year old son smalltown pastor emergency surgery slip consciousness enter heaven awake recount experience unlock mystery drama randall wallace greg kinnear kelly reilly connor corum 2014
